Expansion.Body:
<add name="«BlockAnchor»«Field(ConnectionString,ConnectionString Name)»«Caret»" 
connectionString="
XpoProvider=Postgres;
Server=«Field(MyServerAddress,ip or host)»;
User=«Field(MyUserName,UserName)»;
Password=«Field(MyPassword,Password)»;
Database=«Field(MyDatabase,Database)»;
Encoding=«Field(UNICODE,Encoding)»" />«FinalTarget»

<add name="«BlockAnchor»«Field(ConnectionString,ConnectionString Name)»«Caret»" 
connectionString="
XpoProvider=Pervasive;
Server=«Field(MyServerAddress,ip or host)»;
UID=«Field(MyUserName,UserName)»;
PWD=«Field(MyPassword,Password)»;
ServerDSN=«Field(MyDatabase,Database)»" />«FinalTarget»

<add name="«BlockAnchor»«Field(ConnectionString,ConnectionString Name)»«Caret»" 
connectionString="
XpoProvider=Oracle;
Data Source=«Field(TORCL,Data Source from TNS File)»;
User ID=«Field(MyUserName,UserName)»;
Password=«Field(MyPassword,Password)»" />«FinalTarget»

<add name="«BlockAnchor»«Field(ConnectionString,ConnectionString Name)»«Caret»" 
connectionString="
XpoProvider=ODPManaged;
Data Source=«Field(TORCL,Data Source from TNS File)»;
User ID=«Field(MyUserName,UserName)»;
Password=«Field(MyPassword,Password)»" />«FinalTarget»

<add name="«BlockAnchor»«Field(ConnectionString,ConnectionString Name)»«Caret»" 
connectionString="
XpoProvider=ODP;
Data Source=«Field(TORCL,Data Source from TNS File)»;
User ID=«Field(MyUserName,UserName)»;
Password=«Field(MyPassword,Password)»" />«FinalTarget»

<add name="«BlockAnchor»«Field(ConnectionString,ConnectionString Name)»«Caret»" 
connectionString="
XpoProvider=MySql;
Server=«Field(MyServerAddress,ip or address)»;
User ID=«Field(MyUserName,Username)»;
Database=«Field(MyDatabase,Database)»;
Password=«Field(Password,Password)»;
Persist Security Info=«Field(true,Persist Security Info)»;
Charset=«Field(utf8,Charset)»"
/>«FinalTarget»

<add name="«BlockAnchor»«Field(ConnectionString,ConnectionString Name)»«Caret»" 
connectionString="
XpoProvider=MSSqlServerCE;
Data Source=«Field(MyDatabase.sdf,Data Source)»;
Password=«Field(Password,Password)»"
/>«FinalTarget»

<add name="«BlockAnchor»«Field(ConnectionString,ConnectionString Name)»«Caret»" 
connectionString="
XpoProvider=Firebird;
DataSource=«Field(localhost,Server Address)»;
User=«Field(SYSDBA,UsarName)»;
Password=«Field(masterkey,Password)»;
Database=«Field(MyDatabase.fdb,Database)»;
ServerType=«Field(0,ServerType)»;
Charset=«Field(NONE,Charset)»"
/>«FinalTarget»

<add name="«BlockAnchor»«Field(ConnectionString,ConnectionString Name)»«Caret»" 
connectionString="
XpoProvider=DB2;
Server=«Field(MyAddress,Server Address)»:«Field(MyPort,Port)»;
User ID=«Field(MyUserName,UsarName)»;
Password=«Field(MyPassword,PassWord)»;
Database=«Field(MyDatabase,Database)»;
Persist Security Info=«Field(true,Persist Security Info)»"
/>«FinalTarget»

<add name="«BlockAnchor»«Field(ConnectionString,ConnectionString Name)»«Caret»" 
connectionString="
XpoProvider=Ase;
Port=«Field(5000,port)»;
Data Source=«Field(MyAseServer,Password)»;
User ID=«Field(MyUserName,UserName)»;
Password=«Field(MyPassword,Password)»;
Initial Catalog=«Field(MyDatabase,Database)»;
Persist Security Info=«Field(true,Persist Security Info)»"
/>«FinalTarget»

<add name="«BlockAnchor»«Field(ConnectionString,ConnectionString Name)»«Caret»" 
connectionString="
XpoProvider=Asa;
Uid=«Field(MyUsername,UserName)»;
PWD=«Field(MyPassword,Password)»;
DBF=«Field(c:\mydatabase.db,DBF Path)»;
Persist Security Info=«Field(true,Persist Security Info)»"
/>«FinalTarget»

<add name="«BlockAnchor»«Field(ConnectionString,ConnectionString Name)»«Caret»" 
connectionString="
XpoProvider=Advantage;
Data Source=«Field(\\myserver\myvolume\mypat\mydd.add,Data Source)»;
ServerType=«Field(Local,ServerType)»;
User ID=«Field(ASSSYS,User ID)»;
TrimTrailingSpaces=«Field(true,TrimTrailingSpaces)»"
/>«FinalTarget»

<add name="«BlockAnchor»«Field(ConnectionString,ConnectionString Name)»«Caret»" 
connectionString="
XpoProvider=MSSqlServer;
Data Source=«Field((local),Data Source)»;
User ID=«Field(username,Database UserName)»;Password=«Field(password,Database Password)»;
Initial Catalog=«Field(database,Database Name)»;Persist Security Info=«Field(true,)»"
/>«FinalTarget»

<add name="«BlockAnchor»«Field(ConnectionString,ConnectionString Name)»«Caret»" 
connectionString="
XpoProvider=InMemoryDataStore;
Data Source=«Field(C:\database.xml,XML Path)»;
Read Only=«Field(false,Read Only)»" />«FinalTarget»

<add name="«BlockAnchor»«Field(ConnectionString,ConnectionString Name)»«Caret»" connectionString=" XpoProvider=XmlDataSet; Data Source=«Field(C:\database.xml,XML Path)»;Read Only=false" />«FinalTarget»

<add name="«BlockAnchor»«Field(ConnectionString,ConnectionString Name)»«Caret»" 
connectionString="
XpoProvider=MSAccess;
Provider=Microsoft.Jet.OLEDB.4.0;
Data Source=«Field(C:\database.mdb,Database Path)»;
User Id=«Field(Admin,Database UserName)»;Password=«Field(,Database Password)»;
" />«FinalTarget»
